message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer to buy it from me?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I think my product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $95?
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I'm willing to meet you a bit closer to that. I'll offer it to you for $105.
I'm getting closer to a deal, but I still think I can do better. How about $98?
I'm not willing to go as low as $98, but I'm willing to make a small concession. I'll offer it to you for $108.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit higher than that. How about $102?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the deadline, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll offer it to you for $115.
I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to know if you're willing to meet me at $100. This is my final offer.
